com.groupone.p2pgame

Class CheckerSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupone.p2pgame.CheckerSquare

  • public class CheckerSquare
extends java.lang.Object
    CheckerSquare holds the data of one square in a checkers game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckerSquare(int index)
      Create a new checkers square at give index.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIndex()
      Get the index of square on the checkers board.
      Piece getPiece()
      Get the piece contained within this square.
      int getX()
      Calculate the x coordinate of this square.
      int getY()
      Calculate the y coordinate of this square.
      void setPiece(Piece piece)
      Set the piece of the square, forgetting the old one.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckerSquare

        public CheckerSquare(int index)
        Create a new checkers square at give index.
        Parameters:
        index - The 0-63 number that all squares are assigned based on the left to right top down order.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Calculate the x coordinate of this square.
        Returns:
        The x coordinate.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Calculate the y coordinate of this square.
        Returns:
        The y coordinate.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Get the index of square on the checkers board.
        Returns:
        The index, a number from 0 to 63.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Get the piece contained within this square.
        Returns:
        The piece that happens to be in that square.

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(Piece piece)
        Set the piece of the square, forgetting the old one.
